SQLPortfolioDAO - Class in stockmarket.controller
Implementation of a data access object for accessing a SQL database where stock portfolios are saved.
SQLPortfolioDAO() - Constructor for class stockmarket.controller.SQLPortfolioDAO
Constructs this controller by loading the database properties from file and configuring access permits through a Semaphore object.

An extension of the standard PortfolioModel to integrate a field for a SQL userid primary key.

Create a new instance of this model.

StockHistoryPanel - Class in stockmarket.gui

stockmarket - package stockmarket
The top-level package of this program.
stockmarket.controller - package stockmarket.controller
Contains all of the classes for executing events in the program.
stockmarket.gui - package stockmarket.gui
Contains all the classes that compose the User Interface of this program.
stockmarket.gui.dialog - package stockmarket.gui.dialog
Contains dialog classes for the StockMarket program.
stockmarket.model - package stockmarket.model
Contains the models that store mutable data values for this program.
IDEAS FOR MODELS:

SelectedStockModel - contains a reference to a Stock object that is currently selected, or null if there is no currently selected Stock.

ComponentsEnabledModel - tracks which components in the GUI are currently enabled.
stockmarket.stock - package stockmarket.stock
Provides the classes necessary to create Stock objects for this program.
stockmarket.util - package stockmarket.util
Contains utility classes with constant values and other resources that need to be shared between various packages in this program.
